Text: Hmph, not bad. But as long as my black pearl glimmers, I cannot be defeated.
Lapis Lazuli Knight. Will you keep using your friends as your shield? You have yet to show me your true resolve!
Elazul! Don't shoulder this burden alone. We've got your back!
...Thank you, but she's right. I need to answer this question myself.
...Maybe you're right. Maybe I don't have what it takes to defeat Lady Blackpearl on my own.
But I'm getting back Pearl, whatever the cost! That means...I can't back down now!
Won't anyone listen to me!? I'm telling you, a fearsome creature calls these caverns its home!
I came all this way to tell you—
Whoa... Didn't think a monster that big could get around down here.
I was...careless as well. This...cat thing seems to have protected me as well.
I think I might've pulled a muscle...
Uh oh... Looks like beastie boy's throwing a temper tantrum. At this rate, if we don't do something quick, we'll be buried alive.
...A proposal for you: let's settle this later. Right now, please... help me protect my friends!
Ha! I suppose it couldn't hurt.
You said it, ..主人公..! I won't allow my... No, I won't allow OUR spirits to be crushed by some monster!
I see... Gutsy enough to order around two Jumi Knights, eh? How amusing! You'd better have my back, too!
Let's do this. No matter what stands in my way, there's only one thing for me to do—carve a way out for my comrades!
You don't have to do this!
Say, this person could be a faerie. Don't you think?
Ummm... What are you supposed to do when you meet people for the first time, again?
I'm Mousseline. Nice to meet you.
Hellooo? I'm here too! My name is Baashear.
I see. ..主人公.. and Baashear. Where did you come from, and what brings you here?
We've come from the Sanctuary of Mana. And we're on a mission from the Mana Goddess to find the Mana Sword—a sword that can save the world!
But we're thinking that in order to get the sword, we'll need some help from a faerie. Which brings us here.
I don't really get it? But...sounds like you need to talk to my friends.
Okay, just follow me. I know the way out.
And doesn't it kind of seem like we've been walking in circles?
I KNEW IT! We were just here moments ago!
Yes! We have! Look! We're literally retracing our own footsteps!
Everyone okay? What was THAT all about, anyway?
So you're being chased by this guy, and he doesn't want you to have the Sword of Mana. Does that mean he wants it? Or...
I've seen a lot of guys like that before. And they are always up to no good.
But surely you wanna know right? I mean, he is kind of trying to kill you. And with no good reason, I bet.
Welcome back, ..主人公... Hard at work, I see?
I see... The way you left that echo may sound disappointing...
But do not fret. It only means that the sword that lies there was not the one we seek. That is all.
And have you noticed? The things you see and hear... Your experiences from these memories are becoming your power.
Threads of unawakened visions will soon weave together one by one and become a sure path, leading you to the Mana Sword.
So do not worry, my precious child. My hope for our world.
Now go! Search for your sword and your faerie. They are both waiting for you to find them in a memory...
(I felt like I could see it in my mind... A vision of a shimmering faerie.)
Hawkeye! ..主人公..! Look! Just beyond the clouds!
Well, wouldja look at that! The gate to the sanctum! The Sword of Mana should be in there.
..主人公..... Can you hear me? I am Faerie, a familiar to the Mana Goddess in this world.
To put it bluntly, the Sanctuary of Mana rejects you.
You are not of this world, and thus cannot be.
Return to your world. The sword you seek here is not meant for you.
The memory of the echo was etched deep into ..主人公...
You look like you're having a good day. What's up?
Go study magic? Nah. I mean, you're welcome to, but now that José's not around, a girls gotta go out and live her life, you know?
Yeah, there was the whole thing with the Crimson Wizard. I mean, there's not much to say, but you-know-who is still not quite over it.
You would not believe how amazing it felt to finally use magic. Living up to all those expectations? Oh yeah. That's the stuff.
You know I'm a princess, right? I'm not the type to flaunt their status, but would it kill you to let me get my way every once in a while?
So much about this place is just... I dunno... 'different.' Not at all like Altena, that's for sure.
I don't really have anything to say at the moment. Okay, actually, wait. Do I talk too much? I feel like I've been talking, like, A LOT.
We all have trials we gotta face someday. That's just life. You just gotta remember 'we' includes you, too.
I feel like you're doing all the heavy lifting in this relationship. If you need me to do something, all you gotta do is ask, okay?
I dunno, is it just me, or are we totally soulmates? ...On the battlefield, I mean!
I...should have probably prepared better for this.
Come on, bro. Now's not the time to be moping around!
Did you see all the other fighters, though!?
And you call yourself a lackey. Hmph. Get it together, already!
Hey, ..主人公..! Can you please talk some sense into this guy?
I mean, I get it. Sitting here moaning about it won't help, but...
Run? Do you even know what Primm would do to us if we did that? There's just no way...
Sooo, then let's get to training! We're not winning this any other way.
Okay, so I've been whipping around this weapon a while now, and I don't feel even the slightest bit stronger. What gives?
Yeah... To be honest, I'm not even sure we're doing this whole training thing right at all. Don't think ..主人公.. does either.
How bout you, Popoi? Any ideas?
Nope! Remember? I got the whole amnesia thing. Barely remember what we had for breakfast.
Right... Well, then what are we supposed to do?
Yo! Mind if I join you guys? Could use a sparring partner!
Aha! I had a feeling you'd be able to block that.
Hey! That's my lackey you're attackin', mister! Er, wait a second. Aren't you the favorite to win this thing?
Okay, Duran. What's the big deal? We do something to offend you?
I was just thinking about how boring this tournament was gonna be, until I saw you guys. Looked like you were having fun so I came over to say hi.
So that's what that was. Yeaaah... You're gonna have to do a bit more than swinging your weapons around.
Imagine how easy it'd be if you could get stronger just by panicking? 'Fraid it's gonna take more than that though.
Truth is, we have no idea how training works, or how to train, really.
Well then, let me help! You gotta fight if you wanna get better at fighting! So come on, gimme your best shot.
That's it? You couldn't even outfight a rabite with stamina like that.
Now, I'll admit, you've got some talent—you just gotta figure out a way to harness it! You gotta go all out, you know?
Go all out!? I can't even move right now.
All right, then tell me this. Why do you wanna get stronger? You're never gonna get stronger if you don't have a reason!
You go first. Why do you want to get stronger?
Me? I'm chasin' after my old man. He was a knight of great renown, and I wanna be even greater than he was.
I'm sure you all have your own reasons. You gotta hold on to that. Let it inspire you.
Sorry, didn't mean to turn this into a lecture, and I guess I should be heading back anyway. See you at the finals, eh?
'SeE YoU aT ThE FiNalS', he says! If he doesn't lose before he gets there, that is!
Okay folks! New orders—beat that guy and make him my new lackey!
He did go out of his way to train us. It'd be almost rude if we didn't beat him, right?
(I don't have that reason just yet, Duran. But for now, I just gotta give it all I got!)
Wanna make a run for it?
BAAASHEAR! And that guy with the funky hair must be...
BAAASHEAR! And that girl with the amazing pigtails must be...
Ah, a friend of few words. Better than a certain loud-mouth we all know and love...
Wow, that is a great question!
Huh. I didn't even think to wonder until you asked. But how exactly did we get here?
Let's see... ..主人公.. is about to go on an adventure, and came to bring us along!
That STILL doesn't tell us where we are! Or how we got here!
So, I've got a theory. Hear me out...
You were wishing with all your heart that these two could join us...and here they are.
WAIT! If you can do that with people, can you do that with things? Hurry up and wish for the Mana Sword!

I see the conviction in your face!
...But it's not working.
Hey! Take this seriously! I can tell you're not thinking of the Mana Sword—it's written all over your face!
Alas, I guess it's hard to think of something you've never actually seen.
Quite the pickle, eh? Those two have no idea where we are, we have no idea where we are, and none of us know where to go looking for clues!
Hey, we were teleported here just like you. It's not our fault we're lost!
For someone who's on an important mission from the goddess, you sure do seem to be in the dark about what you're supposed to do.
Baa! Of course I am! I've never had to find a Mana Sword sword before!
How do you even find a Mana Sword? Not like there's a big red sign that says 'Here be Mana Swords' or something.
Oh my gosh, Honeycomb! I am sorta-kinda pretty sure we totally know this place!
I can almost guarantee we don't.

No! Look! The cotton candy flowers, the chill in the air...
And see that lake off in the distance?
Oh! You're right. That must be...Lake Riyama!
The Mana Sword you're looking for is in that lake, for sure! I've read the story enough times to know!
Well, at least someone is having fun.
I'm not exactly sure what the two of you are talking about, but...
If there are still legends about the sword, we may be in the right place after all.

But surely we will find the Mana Sword this time!
Give it your all, ..主人公...
Adventuring with those two is bad for my nerves, so I'll just stay out of the way.
C'mon ..主人公.. and Baashear! Let's go! Good ol' Duffle will lead the way!
(Aha! So that's what all the gloom and glum was about. You wanted to see these two again!)
(You can't fool me, ..主人公... You might not admit it, but I see that goofy smile on your face! You wanted to see these two again!)
Looks like you're starting to get used to being dropped in the middle of nowhere, eh?

Now, where are we this time?
From the looks of it...
By the look on your face, I guess you've never read about it.
It's where the best part of the Legend of the Mana Tree takes place. For in the center of the lake, deep within the ruins lies the mystical sword...
As if called there, the Mana Swordsman arrives to free the sword from its slab—a feat that no one had ever achieved!
So first we had our little monster bash...
And now we're on a legit quest! For the Mana Sword! I dunno about you guys, but I'm pumped!
We should do our special trio thing! Okay guys get those poses ready!
Come on! I expected as much from Honeycomb, but I thought you'd join me at least!
Aw yeah! I knew you'd be down! We gotta work on the timing, but I'll take it!
It was bad enough when it was just a victory pose...
All right, folks! The moment you've all been waiting for. Let the All-Valsena Tournament of Champions BEGIN!
Oooh! I shoulda known bro was gonna go to bat with my chakrams...
Looks like from the first round, Popoi and Duffle are out.
Hey, I might be out, but I put up a good fight. How'd you do, Duffle?
So I charged in, looking to end it early, you know? And I kinda, uh, ran too far and stepped out of bounds.
Yeah, you could say that. Hehe!
Looks like Duran won his match. And if he keeps winning, looks like he'll be my opponent in the semis.
IF you can beat me, Randi. 'IF.'
We better focus on this Duran guy. Those brats won't be any trouble.
And that's it folks! The ref has called it. Your winner is...Randi!
Oh? What's this? We've got a flag on the field! And the ref is saying Honeycomb is disqualified for using magic!
All right, I'm ready to go! Who am I up against?
And I'm not losin' to my own lackey, magic or no!
And I won't hold back either.
You're not bad with that weapon of yours, bro. But it ain't gonna do you much good if you can't get in close enough to use it!
Come on, bro! You're gonna have to do more than just dodge the whole time!
Ngh... I can't keep this up for much longer.
You know what they say—if ya can't dodge it, swat it!
Hey hey, now! Come on and bring it!
Take that! And that! Ready to give up yet, Randi!?
(Man, I can't get close enough to attack! She's too good, and too fast!)
You can't win if you don't attack!
I can't let her get the best of me!
Pride's a little hurt, but fine otherwise. When did you get so good at this, Randi?
I mean, you beat me? Have some confidence, man!
Looks like Randi won his match. That means we're up next!
You sure talk a big game for someone with such little experience!
Hmph. I might not be able to use magic, but don't think for a second, I'll go down easy!
Besides. I've seen you fight plenty enough to know I can win this. En garde!
Huh... You're pretty nimble. I'll give you that! But don't think you'll win so easily!
Huh!? Wait! That was a mistake! I didn't mean—
Yeah, and if I had been able to use magic, then I definitely would have won!
And now that you've beat me, you better make it to the top!
There's still a bit of time before the next fight, so how about a little warm-up before go time?
Ever heard my brother play the harp? He's pretty good, so if ya haven't, you should!
Wanna go on a date? Now look at that, you look redder than an apple. D'ya think I was serious?
Time goes by reeeal slow here. The kinda slow you wish you were spendin' with somebody else, ya know what I mean?
Might not look it, but I'm pretty handy with a knife. It's the only weapon I use, after all.
Don't like talkin' 'bout the past, if I'm bein' honest. Ain't a lot of good memories back there.
Seen a lot of places over the years, and I gotta say, this town sure is unique. I mean that in a good way, by the by.
Favorite food? Well I ain't had a whole lot to begin with, so I guess you could say they're all my favorite.
Take me on your next adventure, will ya? Don't worry, I can hold my own.
You seen Sumo around? Fine if ya haven't. Just askin' is all.
You have just experienced the true power of the mana fruit! Quite impressive, is it not?
The world you see before you is the memory of a place locked within the mana fruit!
The Mana Goddess says these memories are called 'echoes.' It'd be smart to remember that, child of man.
That said, I'm not exactly familiar with the echo we are currently in...
I can say for sure we're in a town, and that we're not in danger. I'd wager a coat on it!

I've never seen such fearsome creatures!
..主人公.., make quick work of them, won't you?
I knew I could count on you! Now let's see what you can do!
What do you think that weapon on your back is for? Go on! Steel thyself! Show those monsters who's boss!
Egad! How do you expect to put fear in the hearts of monsters with a measly stick like THAT!?
...You've only ever fought in your dreams, you say?
My goddess... I'm afraid our journey is at an end before it's even began!
Those little guys didn't hurt ya did they? Well don't you worry one bit, I'm here to save the day!
Save the day? Not when your guard is THAT wide open.
Oh! Hey! Good looking out, Honeycomb!
Maybe focus a little more on the monsters, eh? What are they even doing here in the middle of town, anyway?
Huh, that is weird, isn't it? I don't think I've ever seen them come into town like this before.
But, as long as we're around to protect the peace, what's a few monsters?
Easier said than done. It's not like we have any practical battle experience.
Honeycomb! It'll be fine! Seriously, between the three of us, it'll be easy peasy lemon squeezy!
Speaking of which! Hey, you with the stick! What's your name?

Okay, ..主人公..!
Glad to meet ya!
Heh. It was a troublesome task to get here, but worth the effort. For in the end, all these precious Mana Stones hidden in the depths of this cavern are mine to claim.
It would seem my visit to this world had its merits. And I can already feel it.
The incredible power seething inside these Mana Stones will surely serve their purpose in restoring the Empire.
Hahahahaha... Now yield your power to me!
What's this!? A disturbance in the Mana...?
It can't be... Something else within the stones—
Hm? Something the matter, child of man? You can tell me! I'm not just a guide, I'm a confidante as well, you know!
A sheep must journey with companions of the highest quality and stature! So, uh, how about we go on an adventure?
Surely by now you understand the importance of the Mana Tree! You do? That's the spirit! Now, off we go!
Except there's another one of those magic circles. Don't start acting like you don't know what we've gotta do.
We've used a lot of these jumps to get here, but something feels off about this one.
Really? If Baashear's got a bad feeling about it, then maybe we should leave this one alone.
What do you think we should we do, ..主人公..?
How 'bout I decide for you brats?
Baaah! I knew this would happen! We've been separated again!
Eep! We come in fleece—I mean peace!
You seem...harmless enough. The name's Sumo. What's yours?
..主人公.., huh? Mind joining me for a bit?
A quick answer! I like that. I think we're gonna get along just fine.
You're not wrong to be suspicious. I guess it was a bit out of the blue...
As strange as it may sound, I've got a feeling that you and I are being guided by the same sort of fate.
And two heads are better than one, right?
Just when we thought we were lost, a friendly face! What a wonderful coincidence.
The Faeriewood has long been spellbound to easily lose your way. So I'm not surprised you've found yourselves wandering in circles.
Part of the idea was to keep random folks from just popping in, you know? But another part of it might've been to have a little fun playing tricks.
But since the forest started changing, we faeries had to make landmarks to keep ourselves from getting lost. Ironic, huh? Faeries lost in their own Faeriewood.
Anywho, as long as you know the secret, it's easy peasy, so allow me to break it down for you.
Start from Luna, then Salamando, Undine, Dryad, Sylphid, and Gnome...
Just follow the landmarks in the same order. Like moon, fire, water, wood, and wind. Got it?
Heh. That's my ..主人公..! Keep that in your noggin and you can come visit faeries anytime.
Heh, let me make it easy for you. It's like the elements for the days of the week. You know the days of the week, don't you?
But it's alright if you don't remember. I bet once you see them, you'll pick it up easy.
By the way, not every place has a landmark.
Isn't that interesting? If you ever find a place like that, we should check it out together!
Say, uh... I've got something I'm curious about.
Why must you always stand so close!?
Y-Yes, I mean, you're basically on top of ..主人公..! Right, ..主人公..? It's odd, don't you agree?
Right!? Too close for comfort! Just looking at you two makes my wool itch!
A little weird? But I don't mean any harm...
Either way, let's get this party started, eh? Try to keep up!
Oh, and just a thing that came to mind, but doesn't Honeycomb have wings that kind of look like the ones these faeries have?
I thought that may be the case. But why would he do that?
Honeycomb? A faerie? I sincerely doubt it. I mean, maybe. I suppose stranger things have happened.
This Honeycomb wouldn't happen to be a sorcerer, would he? I've seen some sorcerer outfits that are like that. This was ages ago, though.
When humans were first starting to get into faerie magic, they would dress up like us, and I guess it just stuck?
I mean who wouldn't want wings? I think it's cute, to be honest.
I bet your friend would freak out if he met me.
Wait, I was just about to ask you the same thing. Still looking for the Mana Sword I take it?
Hey, do you know where the hell this is? We were just minding our own business when suddenly we get warped here.
Wait, it's just you? Where are your other two buddies?
One question at a time please! Oh boy, where do we start...
That is...a lot to take in, but I'll take your word for it.
We showed up just after your friends disappeared, right? We better hurry up and find them!
I don't remember volunteering to round up some brats.
But... Since this isn't my world, and I have nothing else better to do... Fine, I'll help.
Save the gratitude till after we find your friends.
Oh, don't be so modest, Scrappy! I see your tail wagging!
I-I can't control it! And I'd prefer if you didn't point it out...
Heh heh! You're like an open book I love to read!
I like the cut of your jib, kiddo! Leave the brat finding to me.
You can be surprisingly kind sometimes, Raxa.
Yeah? And? Scorfolk just express themselves differently. Unlike dogfolk, we don't have to constantly seek affection! Now, who's a good boy?
So this is the Mana Temple? Kinda exciting!
Makes me feel more nervous than excited. There's a solemn feeling about this place that doesn't quite sit right.
So, while I'm happy you're excited Duffle, we don't know if it's safe or not. So don't go running off, okay?
Ugh, what did I just say?
Wait, Duffle! That's a magic circle! Get out of there or you'll—
You're right! Good grief. Those two can really be a hoof-full!
What's that supposed to mean!? I'm sure they were just teleported somewhere else, or something like that!

Aaah! Okay okay okay...
Stay calm, right ..主人公..? We'll figure this out.
They're somewhere in this temple, so we just have to look for them the old-fashioned way!
Hey! How did we... What did you get us into, Scrappy?
Raxa and Blainchet!? What are you two doing here?
After a quick explanation, Raxa and Blainchet realize that they're no longer in their own world.
Okay, so then where is this faerie you speak of anyway, mister?
Now that you mention it...I haven't seen her in a while...
That's so like her, too. Give me all this responsibility, and then only show up when it's convenient.
But it doesn't matter. I need the sword to break the curse that was put on my good friend's sister. I won't stop till I find it.
And when I do that, the sword is yours! You're on a mission too, right?
I won’t be here for long. A ninja must always be on the move.
Surely this is fate. Help us and I'll teach you my skills.
A ninja must forgo the light and live in shadow. It is our way. The mission always comes first.
I won't reveal my identity for no good reason...
The best information is worth its weight in gold.
One might find peace with the comfort this place provides, but to a Nevarl ninja, comfort only breeds anxiety.
Our skills take countless hours of practice to master. You can't just learn them overnight.
As a token of our friendship, I betroth onto you this Nevarl ninja garb... Mm? You don't want it?
You know what? From now on, all your ninja related needs are half off. I call it the shinobi sidekick discount!
Ever heard of artifacts? They can look like just about anything!
Being swift and nimble has always come easy for me.
I'm pretty good at mastering all sorts of weapons in little to no time.
Something about this place just puts me at ease. As if I were home in my own village.
I bet the orchard's bearing fruit right about now...
So do you have a workshop around here? Let me know and I'll get our gear tempered to tip-top shape!
I can play a pretty mean harp, you know. No fooling!
These coins? Yeah, I think they look neat too! And they're etched with the images of elemental spirits, see?
We'd better go and tell Li'l Cactus what we got up to today.
I left Bud and Lisa to keep watch back home, but I wonder how they're doing...
Bam! That was almost too easy!
Sorry, were we in two different battles? I couldn't tell if our friend here was fighting or juggling!
Harsh much, Honeycomb!? I think we make a pretty good team, actually!

Right!?
See, ..主人公.. thinks so too, Honeycomb.

See? Even ..主人公.. agrees.
Two versus one, and the nays have it, Duffle.
Bravo, children of man! You really did a number on those things! When I saw ..主人公.. get all weak-kneed, I thought we were done for...
And then I was so scared I could hardly move.
You said something about monsters not showing up around here, right? That might be due to a unique quirk with echoes.
Echoes are merely worlds built from a memory, after all.
And no memory is perfect, right? So it's only natural for a few anomalies to pop up here and there.
So it's quite natural for things to be slightly out of sort.
I mean, we're a good example of that, if you think about it! Us being here is just one of many types of echo anomalies.
My point is that this likely isn't a one-off thing. So whatever happens on our journey, let's just keep our cool and be careful!
What is THAT!? It's like a stuffed animal, but...it makes words with its mouth?
How rude! I'm Baashear! And I'm a sheep, thank you very much!
...But I don't think I've seen a sheep that can hover in midair before. How does that work exactly? Looks like some sophisticated magic.
In fact, I've never seen magic on a level like this... Just who are you, anyway, ..主人公..?
Yeah! You're definitely not from around here, I bet! Where ya from, ..主人公..?
What? Do you think we're stupid?
We don't know! That's why I asked!
Hold on. Could you mean that you don't know where you came from and you don't know where you are now?

No way, ..主人公..!
You mean you have amnesia? Thaaaat's...nooot goood?
Well, let's start with the basics. This place is called Pinzton. It's our home!
It might seem a little small, but it's on the main road. We get all sorts of visitors.
So I doubt anyone would bat an eye at the thought of having an amnesiac in town!
I know! How about we show you around?
You might feel a bit better once you get your bearings. Come on! Let's go!
Pardon me, child of man, but we're not here for sightseeing. We are on an important task you see, and—

You coming or what?
..主人公.. is quite a bit ahead already.

Oh dear!
Wait for me, ..主人公..!
I think you may be right!
I'm not so sure about that...
Ow! You know, it would have nice to have been warned about this whole falling through the air part!
It's not an adventure if there aren't any surprises, Honeycomb!
Well waddaya know folks! Straight from, well, the sky, we've got ourselves some last minute contenders for this year's tournament!
Wise-guys, eh? You've just entered yourselves into the All-Valsena Tournament of Champions. A contest to see who's the baddest warrior in all the plains!
You heard me right, kiddo! Gotta say, fallin' from the sky was quite the entrance! Are you as excited as I am, folks? Let's hear it!
Wonderful, just wonderful! Now that we have all our entries, let the All-Valsena Tournament of Champions begin!
You know, I didn't know what to expect, but I'd never guess we'd end up in a fighting tournament.
And what's wrong with that? We're knights, fighting's what we do! Perfect chance for us to test our might.
Does your optimism know no end?
Eyyy, I was wondering who that was fallin' out the sky. What an entrance, guys. I sure do have the best lackeys.
I certainly do not remember ever becoming your lackey. Hey, ..主人公.., do you know these people?
Geheh! I always knew you were a smart one, lackey number three!
You gotta be kidding me! Everyone knows Popoi around here. You guys some kinda moles or somethin'?
What? No! This is just our first time meeting you, is all. See, Baashear? Meeting new people already!
Hah! Well at any rate, we should introduce ourselves. I'm Randi. Nice to meet you!
And I'm Popoi, the faerie! Bet you thought I was just normal human, eh?
And I'm Primm. Nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you guys! I'm Duffle, and this is Honeycomb. And ..主人公.. here is how we got here in the first place!
Well, I'm always happy to make new friends. I think I saw how you got here, heh, but what brings you to the tournament?
Just kinda ended up here. How about you guys?
The three of us have been adventuring together, and the foes we face keep getting stronger and stronger...
And so we figured what better way to prepare ourselves for the road ahead than joining a tournament?
Yeah, and if we win, my little group of lackeys might just grow into a full posse! Oh, and there's a prize, too.
But, yeah, I'm not sure we have much of a chance. Everyone else looks way tougher than we do.
See that guy over there? The one with the hair, swingin' his sword around? That guy.
Wow, well at least one of us is confident! I figured you had some skills, but look at the guy over there swinging his sword. The one with the hair.
Wow, that was amazing! His swings are so fast I can barely keep up!
That guy's the favorite to win. He doesn't look so tough to me, though!
Gehah! After I hit 'em with my magic he's gonna wish he never picked up a sword!
A fellow sorcerer, eh? We'll see whose magic brings him to his knees.
Ah, so, about that. Magic is banned from the tournament. Hand to hand only.
What? If I can't use my magic, how can I fight?
We'll figure something out! Besides, it's way more fun if you fight at a disadvantage, right? Really gets the blood pumping!
Couldn't have said it better! Why don't we go over there and talk battle plans?
Great idea! See you guys later!
I should probably start thinking of ideas myself. If we end up being put against each other, don't think for a second that I'll go easy!

And then there were three...
It's neat to see everyone so pumped. What should we do then?
Yeah, bro. In times like this, there's only one thing to do. Train our butts off.
So there was A sword, but not THE sword?
How will you know when you've found the right one? Do you feel it in your bones or something?
So there was A sword, but not THE sword?
How will you know when you've found the right one? Do you feel it in your bones or something?
The search for the Mana Sword seems to be moving along quite well.
Is it? They found the wrong Mana Sword.
The goal is to find the Sword, yes, but the things you learn and the people you meet are an important piece of the puzzle.
All shall guide ..主人公.. to the Mana Sword in time.
Is it? They found the wrong Mana Sword.
The goal is to find the Sword, yes, but the things you learn and the people you meet are an important piece of the puzzle.
All shall guide ..主人公.. to the Mana Sword in time.
If only I had enough power left... I could end the search in a flash. Alas...
The Mana Tree is connected to the memories of all realms. But in my weakened state, I can but see glimpses of these memories.
The mana fruit themselves are formed from mere pieces of fabric stitched together. A collage of half-remembrances...
But the memory is out there somewhere. It may not be the next fruit, but eventually what we seek will appear.
The path to it may be long and winding, but please...do not give up.
The Mana Goddess has gone... It seems she can never talk for very long.
I wish I could hear more though from her and from you, ..主人公... I'd even like to hear more about Randi and Primm and Popoi's journey.
You know, when you join up with Honeycomb and Duffle, you become a trio just like Randi and his friends. Funny, huh?
I wouldn't mind hearing more stories about the two of them! Whatever they're up to, I bet it'll be fun!
Fun!? I do not call getting kidnapped by monsters or being chased around by a scary knight fun! It was a nightmare, in fact!
On top of that, it was a total waste of time. They didn't even have the Mana Sword.
Besides! What we gained from our last adventure was considerably more valuable to us with regards to actually reaching our goal.
Yes, I know, they didn't have the sword we wanted, but at least it was actually related to the Mana Sword!
Anywho, I'm sure we'll find the right one on our next go around.
..主人公.., the Mana Tree is bearing new fruit! Let's get a move on, shall we?
Hey! What's the hold up, ..主人公..?
Was it something I said? About your friends? I don't blame you for wanting to be with them.
That gloomy face won't work with me! So chin up, buttercup! It's time to go!
The Mana Goddess has gone... It seems she can never talk for very long.
I wish I could hear more though from her and from you, ..主人公... I'd even like to hear more about Randi and Primm and Popoi's journey.
You know, when you join up with Honeycomb and Duffle, you become a trio just like Randi and his friends. Funny, huh?
I wouldn't mind hearing more stories about the two of them! Whatever they're up to, I bet it'll be fun!
Fun!? I do not call getting kidnapped by monsters or being chased around by a scary knight fun! It was a nightmare, in fact!
On top of that, it was a total waste of time. They didn't even have the Mana Sword.
Besides! What we gained from our last adventure was considerably more valuable to us with regards to actually reaching our goal.
Yes, I know, they didn't have the sword we wanted, but at least it was actually related to the Mana Sword!
Anywho, I'm sure we'll find the right one on our next go around.
..主人公.., the Mana Tree is bearing new fruit! Let's get a move on, shall we?
Hey! What's the hold up, ..主人公..?
Was it something I said? About your friends? I don't blame you for wanting to be with them.
That gloomy face won't work with me! So chin up, buttercup! It's time to go!
(I felt like I could see it in my mind... A vision of the first Mana Sword I'd laid eyes on...)
The memory of the echo was etched deep into ..主人公...
Okay, just run this by me one more time. What exactly do you do at the Sanctuary of Mana?
..主人公.. harvests fruits from the Mana Tree, and the fruits can transport others to another world...
...where they can search for the Mana Sword in its echo. Have I got it right?
Even hearing it a second time, it still seems unreal! You could go anywhere! Like an all-you-can-adventure fruit buffet!
Excuse me, child of man, but that's NOT how it works!
Oh! Hey, Baashear! How's it floating?
Ahem! I must remind you that ..主人公..'s goal is to find the Mana Sword. We don't have time to waste visiting irrelevant echoes, you see.
Come on! You'd skip out on exploring a world right at your fingertips? I'd be tossing and turning all night just thinking about them.
More importantly, how can you even tell which echoes are irrelevant?
Heheh! It is but one of my many talents, having been chosen by the Mana Goddess herself to guide my friend here!
In fact, it wasn't too long ago that a brand new fruit appeared.
But it seemed a bit different, like it'd sprouted from a jumble of hoots and hollering.
That echo wasn't the one, and luckily, I sniffed it right out. The nose knows, as they say!
Did you hear that, ..主人公..? Hoots and hollers! Whatever was going on there, they were totally having a good time!
Regardless of that, you can't say for sure that echo is irrelevant without checking it out first.
See? Even Honeycomb's coming around! We should go and have a look, you know? Make good and sure!

Now wait a minute, ..主人公...
There's no way I'm going in that weird echo, okay?
And that means...you won't go either, right? You won't leave me here, will you?
Oh! Right! I forgot to introduce myself! I'm Duffle.
If you ever need a hero who's all about getting up in baddies' faces and whackin' 'em in the head, then I'm your girl!
And ol' 'Grumpus Maximus' over here is Honeycomb. He's a total wizard when it comes to magic!
Happy to be fightin' with ya, ..主人公..!
Hey, Duffle, maybe now's not the time for self introductions? Those 'baddies' you're so eager to whack are about to make their move.
Yeah, I know! But how are we supposed to fight as a team if we don't even know each other's names? This is fighting 101 stuff, Honeycomb!
True. Hmph, you know what they say about a broken clock...
So, yeah. I'm the magic expert, as she explained. You and Duffle stay forward, and I'll take the rear. Got it?
Aw yeah! It's you and me takin' center stage!
I'm not the only one who needs luck here! You could use some too! But even without it, you can count on me to back you up.

Heyyy! Well if it isn't ..主人公..!
Remember me? I'm Mousseline!
Heh, to think we'd run into each other again in a place like this, you know? It's like, we're totally destined for each other.
More interested in the snow, I see. That's cold, ..主人公.., in more ways than one.
You seem unusually excited about it though. Is snow really all that special to you?
Oh yeah? You'd think that I'm a liiitle more special to you than some frozen water though.
Oh really? That's too bad. Truth is, I'd like to learn ALL about you.
Anywho, feel free to play in it all you want. But you might wanna keep an eye on your surroundings.
This place might look like a peaceful winter scene, but there's nothing peaceful about it.
Don't you sense it? There's some kinda disturbance in the Mana around here.
Can't tell ya what's causing it, but when the balance in Mana is all out of whack, the monsters get to feeling feisty.
Now I warned ya, so don't blame me if a beasty comes to knock down you and your snowman.
Whoops! I guess they heard their cue... Good luck putting them on ice!
Finally! It sure took a while, but we made it to the top!
You said it! Now, the Winged Defender should be around here somewhere...
Aaah! It's back! The fluffy beast that shook us off earlier!
This is the defender? Are you sure? I suppose I expected something a little larger...
Right? It's more like a Winged Watchdog. Very confusing.
Yes!? A sheep did say that. What are you insinuating?
Hey, you're the Winged Defender, right? It's about time we had a chat, mano a mano.
Oops... Yeah he really doesn't like me, huh.
I do not think it is a dislike for you, but rather, a dislike for your approach.
After all, this Winged Defender is a 'she.'
How about I give you a cuter name, then? Let's see...
Great! Then Flammie it is! Now, Flammie, would you be so kind as to give us a ride?
My friends here need your help in order to fulfill the tasks they have been given.
Great job, Riesz! All we need to do now is fly up and get the Sword of Mana!
Thanks for all the help, Riesz. Are you off to find your brother?
Yes. I have information that says he was taken by a man with red eyes. I must find him.
A man with red eyes!? I know that guy! He's after the Sword of Mana! AND he's already made it to the sanctum!
I sure am. This means that the place we're all supposed to be heading for is the same. This is bigger than a coincidence!
I've got a feeling that this is fate. Don't you, ..主人公..?
Riesz, you've got to come with us!
It would appear so. Please, let me join you!
Speaking of which, what are your plans for when this is all over, ..主人公..?
I don't know! That's why I'm asking!
You haven't? Seriously? You really do have a one track mind, huh?
How about you come live with us in Pinzton? My parents run the inn and we've got plenty of room!
Maybe you should ask your parents' permission first?
But it's not a bad idea. Even if you can't stay at the inn, you could stay at my house.
Yeah! So whaddaya say? Then we could go out on a big adventure, just the three of us!
Heh, so at the end of the day none of us will actually live in Pinzton? Anyway, let's finish the adventure we're currently on first, eh?
Yeah? And? Anyway, consider it a plan made!
Huzzah! We're finally out of that dreadful maze of a forest! I thought we'd be stuck in there forever!
Don't congratulate me! We're in this together you know—my success is yours and vice versa!
Wait, are they with you, Mousseline?
So what!? We're in the middle of this, you know, 'thing' that's going on, and then you bring an unknown human into the mix!?
It's fiiine. I'll be with them the whole time.
Yeah, and I mean it is you we're talking about. I guess it's fine.
Just, uh, don't get too close all right? Humans are scary.
Sorry, what is this 'thing that's going on', again?
You see, the faerie world suddenly got all mixed up. So faeries from all over gathered here in this forest.
Just 'cause we're all faeries doesn't mean we all get along, you know? Put a whole bunch of us together and, well, this happens.
So, now we're broken up into three different groups, and each group is kinda keeping watch on the other—to make sure there's no funny business and all.
This here's the Fringefields, and around here you'll find nothing but faeries who were already cool with each other before all this happened.
And this is where I live, too. It really fits with the whole chill vibe I got going.
Say, Mousseline. Since you're the most powerful faerie in all the forest, why don't you become a mediator?
Cause we really, really, really don't want to go to war.
But that sounds like wooork and I don't wanna do wooork. And besides...
..主人公.. and Baashear already said they were gonna do it.
Yeah, like, think about it. What does a human care if faeries go to war? A human would be totally neutral.
Just a moment please! WE never said ANYTHING about being a mediator!
You wanted to talk to faeries right? Now, you get to talk to, like, all the faeries. So get all your Mana Sword questions ready, 'kay?
That's the spirit! I think you'll get your fill on faerie info.
Sure glad I thought to ask you. And don't worry, I'll make sure you don't get lost on the way.
Heheh, I knooow, riiight? It sounds totally annoying. We are so much alike.
Anyway, if doing it alone is too much, how about you two tag team it? Split it 50/50.
Good grief. Why do I feel like we just got duped?
But seems like we don't have a lot of choice. All the other faeries are afraid of us.
Time to mediate a war, I guess!
Is it finally over? That was no mere beast.
Oh dear! What is it this time!?
Blast it! The whole place is coming down!
Whew... Talk about a close call.
Sorry. If it wasn't for me, you wouldn't have been dragged into this in the first place.
Don't sweat it! It's not your fault we chose to come along for the ride.
...It's too bad, though. We still haven't found your Pearl.
Not sure how Lady Blackpearl and that Niccolo fellow disappeared in the wreckage, but that's a mystery for another day.
It's all right. It's not like Pearl is gone for good. I'll see her again, I know it.
Oh? Is it just me, or is someone in a good mood?
Perhaps... I was so panicked and scared before, worried if I'd be left all alone again.
That fear hasn't gone away, but it's not half as bad as it was.
I have you two hardheads to thank for that... So thank you.
Whoa! A thank you? Without a hint of snark? Are my ears playing tricks on me?
That's enough out of you! You smug little—
Aaand he's back! The grouchy knight we all know and love!
Hey! Who's side are you on, ..主人公..?
Good grief... As I was saying, it's all right. I have a feeling my destiny lies just around the corner.
That's right. And when I do, I'm getting back what's precious to me.
That again? I still don't get it...but thanks.
Oh, it's you. What do you want?
Well, it may not be my place to say this, and I don't know what happened between you two, but are you really sure you want to leave him without saying anything?
Take it from me, it's best to say goodbye while you can. Else you'll regret it later...
Thanks for the tip, but as long as his core still sparkles, he and I shall surely cross paths again someday.
Who's to say what he will do when the time comes... All I can do is wait and see what path he chooses when faced with his destiny.
Sorry to bother, but I have...a gift for you!
Baaha! What do you think? A a fine set of gear just perfect for your adventure, if I do say so myself!
But it won't do you any good just sitting there. Hurry and equip it!
And more forest that-a-way... There's forest in every direction, huh?
I hear you have to be EXTRA careful in places like this, ..主人公..! It's easy to get all mixed up if you're not paying attention to where you're going.
Tread lightly, or you are sure to get lost!
I assumed that because you decided to talk to me it was about something important. Seems I assumed wrong.
You never learn, do you? How many times must I ignore you?
Wicked Purpose? Mere propaganda. What is wicked to some is virtue to others.
Teach you magic? Hmph. I doubt you could handle it.
You look almost ready to learn about the dark arts... What say you?
You are no average minion, indeed.
This magic will someday... You know what, never mind.
I trust too deeply in the power of dark magic, is it? Hmph. How long has it been since anyone has lectured me?
I have traveled this road for so long, yet I feel no closer to the end than since I had began. Power...what am I missing?
Sometimes I ponder on the possibility of a life different than the one I chose. Hm...
Maybe I should take a nap!
Humans are such busy bees...but I haven't the faintest idea why.
What a small town... Very local vibe going on here.
Wanna know more about me, huh? Hee hee, where shall we start?
My age? Hm, gimme a second. I'm trying to remember.
Looking for something? Or maybe...you're looking for me?
No one likes a third wheel. How bout we go out, just the two of us?
I say just have fun, forget all the other stuff.
The Mana Tree... Source of all things, huh.
Wish could just vanish together. Can't do it? Boooriiing.
You've made a believer out of me. If anyone can find the Mana Sword, it's you, ..主人公..!
WHOA! Hold on. If you're looking for the Mana Sword...then that makes ..主人公.....the Mana Swordsman!?
Come on, Duffle. We JUST talked about this. The Mana Sword and the Mana Swordsman are myths. That's it.
In other words, they're made up. They don't really exist.
Made up? Watch your tongue, if you please!
In fact, the Mana Goddess herself sent us to this world in search of the sword you so confidently call a 'myth.'
So you're actually trying to tell me that there is a Mana Goddess, you two come from another world, and all the talk of legends is real? Don't make me laugh.
Look, you've gotta let us help you find the Mana Sword! It's just like with those monsters back there. Three heads are better than one. Right?
Hey! Don't rope me into this!
Come ONNN Honeycomb! If you and I stick with the Mana Swordsman, we don't have to wait for the future. We could be real knights right now.
Just like the Gemma Knights who protected the Mana Swordsman in the legend of the Mana Tree!
Well, I suppose...that doesn't sound so bad.
We won! Teamwork makes the dream work!
Whew... I believe that was the last one.

Doing great, ..主人公..!
Now, let's all get ready for the victory leap! Just bend your knees a little then...
Hey! Come on, you two! I can't be the only one with a little team spirit, here!
Do you really think we did that well? That victory hardly deserves a pat on the back, let alone a victory pose.
..主人公.., thank the goddess you're here! I was but moments away from certain death!
What in the world is that?
Sorry, but I've had my fill of wool-raising encounters for the day!

Now what? And who is this?
Seriously, could today get any more bizarre?
Maybe it's one of those, say 'knight' three times and they appear kinda things? And if that knight's donned in black, well...

Honeycomb! ..主人公..!
Don't ask me why I know, but I'm pretty sure this guy's one of the bad guys!
Yeah. I think that much is obvious, Duffle! Get ready to fight!

We're twins...
So that means I...
(I think it's coming from this way...! But it looks like a dead end ahead...)
(I can't go back though. The only path is forward...)
When all this is over, how do we get home?
This place is...pretty far from where we live.
I just figured the Mana Goddess would whisk us all back home when we were done.
That's how it works, right, Baashear?
But it's all the same in the end! So never you mind!
All right folks, we've made it to the sinister semis! First up, we have Randi the Ravager versus Duran the Destroyer!
Champions at the ready! Set! FIGHT!
Wow, look at Randi go! He's actually keeping up!
Ha! Is that all you've got?
I dunno... Randi's doing okay now, but the difference in experience is starting to show. Don't think he'll be able to keep this up.
Yeah, okay, but is there anything we can do!?
Would you look at that? Well I guess I can't fight with a broken sword, can I?
Does that mean what I think it means!?
Heh. You almost looked cool out there, Randi!
Good fight, you won fair and square. Now go and win the whole darn thing!
All that's left is the finals. Randi vs ..主人公..!
Yeah! So let's head for a grassy practice space to make sure you're ready!
(Hm? Something about this break... Nah, couldn't be.)
Hey! So you find that reason yet?
Not yet. For now I'm just gonna focus on giving it all I got.
I hope you're ready for a fight!
(Well, the look in his eye has certainly changed. I better take this seriously.)
(They're cheering for me! Well I can't let my fans down now, can I?)
(I'm gonna have to lay it all on one last strike if I'm to have any chance at winning!)
This is it folks. The fight to determine who wins the All-Valsena Tournament of Champions! Will it be the mysterious ..主人公.., or Randi the Ravager!?
All right, folks. This one's for all the marbles! Champions at the ready! Set! FIGHT!
The both of them are getting better by the second...
Heh. They look like they're having a lot of fun, to boot.
Heh! They're my lackeys, after all. Keep it up, you two!
Haa... Haa... I'm not done with you yet!
Oooh! I'm on the edge of my seat!
I mean, I can't believe they're still going at it.
They're tough, yeah. But they both look to be finally running out of steam. It shouldn't last much longer.
Perfect timing for the Scorpion Army to finish the job then, eh?
The army that's gonna rule the world! Hahaha!
Real cool, boss! Totally nailed it, boss!
Oh, you noticed our robot, eh? Let me introduce you to our super deluxe robot Kilroy the Indomitable!
Real cool, boss! Totally nailed it, boss!
Mind if a new challenger enters the fray?
You can't just join a match in progress! There are rules here!

Shut yer piehole!
Last one standing wins! Got it?
To get the money, of course! Duh! If you wanna take over the world you also need money. It's actually really expensive.
The original plan was to make it so I won the whole thing, but best laid plans and all that.
Oooh... I remember, you lost in the second round!
Out in style, boss! Cool way to go, boss! Better than last, boss!
You shut yer piehole, too! We went through all that trouble to mess with that big guy's sword, too! All for nothing!
You mean Duran? So that was your fault?
And what if it was!? Anyway, enough of the chit-chat, I got a world to take over!
(Crap... Too tired from the tournament to take on this hunk of junk...)
You bet! I'm goin' all out!
Sorry for the wait! Took me a while to find another sword! You two still got some fight left in you, right!?
We can do this! As long as we all join forces and fight together!
We're don't take kindly to folks that play dirty around these parts. So get ready to be taken to the cleaners.
Guys! Look at those ruins over there across the lake! This must really be Lake Riyama!
It's a bit out of the way, but I bet sightseers come here because of the legend.
This is as far as tourists can get, but we're no tourists!
If we want that sword, we gotta get inside those ruins! And for that, we probably need a boat.
Niccolo's the name, but you can call me Nicco. And if it's a boat you need, I got the deed.
I'll even throw in a discount for the ruins tour, if that's where yous guys is headin'.
That would be amazing! Thank you so much, Nicco!
No sweat. Yous guys' adventurers, yeah? Happy to help.
He's trying to pull a fast one on you. The boat of which he speaks is falling apart and isn't even his.

Hold your horses, my canine friend.
You accusin' ol' Nicco of pullin' a fast one?
Spare us. Everyone knows that you're a scheming salescat who preys on innocent travelers.
I was planning on letting you go with a warning, but if you're trying to fleece children, then you leave me no choice...
Well ain't you a nice guy. Listen, these folks need to get across that lake.
But you got a point. As much as I can't resist makin' a deal, I may have overstayed my welcome, you know?
I'm out. But if yous guys need anythin', gimme a shout. 'Cause when it comes to goods and services, I got you wicked covered.
You expect them to come to you knowing they will be ripped off?

Your words wound me, fella.
I do real honest business with my regulars.
I only take a little off the top on the first sale, you know? Once ol' Nicco's got you figured, it's all, uh, on the straight and narrow from there.
Alls I'm sayin' is I am loyal to my customers. Bet you those mom and pop shops in town won't treat you as good I do.
At any rate, I'll see yous guys later.
At any rate, I'll see yous guys later.
Whew! That was close! I guess not everyone is as nice as Lady Moti.
Oh! Before I forget, thank you, Fluffy! You're such a good boy! Yes you aaare.
...The name's Blainchet. And you don't need to thank me.
Whatever you say, Blainchet! So, about that boat. It really doesn't belong to anyone?
Yes. It has been without owner for quite some time. It's a bit worse for wear, but it'll get you across the lake.
That said, I still wouldn't use it. The ruins are no place for children. They're full of monsters, not to mention the other things I've heard...
Monsters? No problem! We're stronger than we look!
Now, let me pet that little head of yours.
Please excuse her...eccentricities. And just look at her! Too simple to mean any harm!
At any rate, we must be on our way. Thank you for your help.
You look well. As for me, I'm much the same.
Florina... I wonder where you are right now...
There's a jewel hunter... Er. Never mind. Just be sure to keep your eye on anything your'd rather not have stolen.
Elazul? Looking for me? Doubt it. Likely it was Pearl.
There was once a time long ago when I was a Jumi Knight.
Jumi only die when our core is damaged. There is no natural time limit on our lives.
Every Jumi's core is different. Mine is black pearl, Elazul's is lapis lazuli.
Those who cry for Jumi turn to stone. You'd best be careful.
Is there some you are bound to protect? If so, stay with them always. That is where I failed.
Seeing you reminds me of an old friend. You're similar in ways.
Boy, am I bored. Don't suppose my favorite lackey could provide some entertainment, eh?
Come to pick up your boss, eh? Now that's a good lackey!
May not look it, but I'm quite the actor, you know! Geheh!
I don't got the wings and all, but I am a faerie you know! So, uh, handle with care. Got it?
Got some treasure did ya? I'd be beamin', too! Geheh!
Bro. You gotta hide me. Sis is comin' and she knows about the prank I pulled!
Training? You can do that later. Let's go have some boss 'n' lackey fun, eh?
Just happy to see me, is it?
Hey, there goes my favorite lackey! Good lookin' out, bro!
Startin' to think of you like one of the family, bro. Aw man, look at me, gettin' all sentimental!
Who IS this guy!? My magic is barely making a dent!
Baahaha! Take a look at this! A round-up of missions just for you!
Clear these missions and you can get all sorts of neat items for your journey! It's that easy!
Since you're just starting out, the newbie missions should be just right for you. So try for those first!
That's all I've got for now. So what are you waiting for? Hoof to it!
Hmm? Who are you? And what's up with that hair? Hehe... Did you do it yourself?
Oh? Who are you? And what's up with that hair? Hehe... It's super cool!
Yup! By the time I got here, I already forgot why I was mad in the first place.
Only babies cry, and I'm no baby!
I come here when I want to be alone and think. Pretty nice, right?
...Want to hear a story of mine? It's about us, the Mana clan.
When the Mana Tree withers, and the world falls into peril, a girl from our clan must become the next Mana Tree. Such is the fate of the Mana Goddess...or so they say.
Dema and I are twins, and she was chosen as the next Mana Goddess...
But we don't know when that day will be—it might never come, or it could be tomorrow.
So...it's not like I want to fight with her, you know? It's more like...
I wanted to stand up to her for once. Not that I had much success...
You see, Dema always tells me the same thing—she won't be lonely when she becomes the goddess.
'How could I be lonely when I know my other half is still alive out there, in the new world I created?'
But is that what she really thinks? I'm not so sure...
What I do know is, if her other half was always at her side, she wouldn't have to decide everything on her own.
But instead, to protect me, she carries all that weight by herself. Just thinking about it makes me feel so...lonely.
