Whaaat? No way. This is the part where the boy rescues the girl!
He's the hero and he's going to be a great swordsman one day.
But Dema, boys get scared too, you know. Plus, all the fairy tales already have brave heroes.
Boooring. Why not have a dumb hero instead? That's way more fun!
No can do. You already made him brave and cool. We can't have him act lame now. It'd ruin everything!
You have always had the strangest ideas. They totally derail the story.
Just listen to your big sis! I won't lead you astray.
We're twins, so don't 'big sis' me! And what's wrong with mixing things up a bit?
I said no! Stories have rules. You can't just go around breaking them just because you feel like it!
Fine, have it your way! I don't care about you or your dumb story!
There she goes... She's such a handful sometimes.
Always so childish, selfish, and spoiled... And she never listens to a word I say.
...You know I can see you, right?
One must stick to the storyline, wouldn't you agree?
Exactly. I'm glad we see eye to eye.
Well then, since we are on the same wavelength, do you mind if I ask you for a favor?
Oh? You're on her side? It seems I'm surrounded by children...
Well then, since you and Nona are on the same wavelength, do you mind if I ask you for a favor?
Could you go look for her for me? With the way she left, she's probably somewhere all alone, sobbing her eyes out.
We may fight sometimes, but she's still my dear sister—my irreplaceable other half.
Hee hee! You know, this might seem strange, but I feel like this isn't the first time I've asked you for help.
Hmm... Well then, my mysterious new friend, I'm counting on you.
No, I like to mix things up.
I almost forgot—I've got candy on me! If you take damage, alls ya gotta do is just eat one of these to recover!
Potos Village is this way. Follow me.
Sis, I'm the boss here. I give the orders.
Do you even know where we are right now?
Wait. Actually, I've never come this far either.
And it almost feels like we're going the opposite way on the path Randi would use to go to the village.
Ugh. The Cannon Man's supposed to save us time, not waste it!
There are some nasty beasts in this area. Sure glad you're here with me because I could use the help!
You took the words right out of my mouth! You can even use magic I've never heard of.
You've never heard of it? I don't think my magic is that rare though.
Be careful. I sense some tough monsters up ahead.
A dragon! And a pretty mean one at that! Let's take it down!
Ah, so this is Potos Village, huh? Doesn't look too scary to me.
Doesn't look like Randi's here, either.
Yeah. If they'da found him, the villagers would be running around screaming about curses and calamity right about now.
He told us once about a waterfall on the other side of the village, remember? The place where he freed the Mana Sword.
Oh! Good thinking, lackey! Let's check it out. A place with a connection to Bro might just give us a lead to him, too!
Hey you! Outsiders! You can't go through there!
It's a village decree! I'm gonna tell the elder!
Hey, what? What we do is none of your business! Now out of the way, brats.
Who you callin' a brat, brat!?
Yeah! You're the only brat around here, bratty brat-brat!
What did you just say? You booger eating, pea-brained little—
Popoi! That's enough! We don't need to stoop to their level.
They're just kids. Don't take everything they say so seriously.
Said the big brat to the little baby brat!
Good one, Elliott! Look at their dumb brat faces! Baby Brat and Biggy Brat, sitting in a tree, b-r-a-t-i-n-g!
Say 'brat' one more time, you little punks.
Guess this 'big' brat is going to have to teach the 'little' brats a lesson, huh?
You're right. I can't let these kids get in my head.
But just in case, let's go before I give them the beating of a lifetime.
Hey! Don't egg her on! Get her going and I doubt either of us could stop her!
..主人公.., I think that's our cue to get out of here.
All right, sooo...what do we do? There's no getting through there to reach the waterfall.
But we still think Bro might be there, right?
I mean, we didn't see him coming up the road on the way here...
Kinda feels like it wants us to follow it.
(I can't focus... It's like...someone's calling my name...)
Hey! ..主人公..! You okay!? Say something!
That Ebon Knight's got nothing on you! You're the Mana Swordsman, and my friend! You got this!
I'm here 'cause you wished it, right? Then let me help you! I don't know where you are, but just call my name, call out anyone's name—we'll come find you!
The end of the tale of the Mana Swordsman is a happy one! So don't even think about giving up!
Hey, can you hear me? You're still just a little brat, so don't try biting off more than you can chew, eh?
Let me have a shot. I'll beat him to a pulp!
Are you all right, ..主人公..? We haven't been friends for long, but that does not matter.
As long as we're here, you are not alone. And no matter what, you must never forget that.
Yup. Seems to me that the disturbance is all gone, and the Mana Stones have settled.
Huh!? What is it this time!?
Uh oh, I think you overdid it. The ceiling's about to cave in on us. Take a look.
Whoa! The icicles are falling! Everybody run!
Wait! What about the Mana Stones!?
Sorry, but we've gotta take a raincheck on that! If you value your life, then beeline it for the exit!
Phew... We made it. The cavern is likely a mess inside, but the kingdom's mages should be able to take care of that.
...In the end, it was a wasted chance.
Hey, now! We should be grateful it wasn't anything worse. And as long as you're alive, there will be plenty of chances to try again.
And just look at this weather now that the storm's all cleared up! The fields look like they're shining. It's beautiful, huh?
..主人公..! Where do you think you're off to?
Figures, you're still a kid! Heheh, but I guess it wouldn't hurt to play once in a while.
But if we're doing this, we're doing it big! Got it?
Well, well... You're pretty cheery for someone who just escaped a cavern with their life. But I'll admit I've got some energy to burn too after all that!
I've got a good arm, ..主人公..! That's the only heads up you'll get!
Maybe so. Now then...how about you tell me what you were really after back there?
Pardon me? I've no idea what you're saying.
I can sense Mana from an ancient time within you. And a dark aura to boot.
You don't seem like any ordinary mage to me. So what's the real story? What do you really want with those Mana Stones?
I've said nothing misleading. Restoring the Vandole Empire is my only goal.
And why do you want to know? If you so much as dare to interfere...
Nah, you don't have to worry about me. Whatever it is you're after or trying to achieve, I couldn't care less.
Because, to me, your goal is absurd.
I see... In other words, you've already given up.
Hey! Julius and Mousseline! Don't keep us waiting!
You're being summoned. How about you hurry along and join their silly game?
Didn't you hear? They're waiting on both of us. Might do you some good to let loose for once.
Ha! I'll pass. I have more important matters to attend to. Unlike you, I'm far from surrendering.
That young girl is naive in some ways, but you'd best remember her words. People have more to teach you than you may think.
People? Teaching ME things? What's that supposed to mean? Maybe if they weren't so busy chasing pointless dreams.
This is your last warning! Get over here, or get ready for a hail of snowballs!
Those two sure look like they're having fun though. I guess I could try it their way...for a little while...
Just one last strike! Follow my lead, Julius!
Hmph! Don't bark orders at me! Now go!
Come on! Let's make a snowman!
Come on! Let's have a snowball fight!
After talking with the faeries back there, I haven't a clue about what's true and what's false.
Especially the whole 'stab the Mana Goddess' part. Just the thought of it makes my wool stand on end.
But either way, I will not let you walk this road alone, ..主人公..!
No matter how scary! I will always be your guide! As it is my duty!
Like a shepherd leading a flock of one! Except you're the sheep in this metaphor.
So don't give up! Because I shall not!
This forest is indeed filled with all sorts of faeries. That last place was quite diverse!
And compared to the Fringefields, Centralis was quite a different place! I can see why they don't get along.
I had a feeling you'd say that! If you weren't human, you'd have no problem blending in with the locals.
Are you serious? I could barely stand the short amount of time we spent there, let alone stay!
Yeah, you'd have a way better time chilling with the faeries over in the Fringefields.
This last village is called Briarborough, correct? What kind of place is it?
Lots and lots and lots of briars.
Yes, I kind of assumed that.
From what the other faeries said, they seem pretty aggressive. On a scale of one to ten, how scary are they?
I mean, a...four? They are actually really cheerful and stuff. I'm just not a huge fan of their whole vibe, if you know what I mean.
Cheerful, you say? Then this should be easy!
What are you up to? If I can be of help, let me know anytime.
A Mana Tree exists here too... Hm? No, only thinking aloud.
Keeping an eye on me, are you? No need. I'm quite harmless.
Could the Dark Lord be here too? Heheh, very interesting.
I won't do anything to Fuji, don't worry. She is too important of a pawn for me to risk putting her in harms way.
Sumo and I have history. But our story's end must come.
This world's strange power... Could it be connected to Mana?
You're an odd one, wanting to travel with someone like me.
There are types of magic being used here I've never seen before. Oh? The magic I wield is rarer than all of them? Interesting...
I'm more suited to war than peace. Don't you agree?
Hey there, ..主人公... Your one and only faerie's here to check up on you. Did you miss me?
My my my... Well isn't this a pickle?
If you give up this whole Mana Sword search, I'll help you out. If not, I won't. So, what's it gonna be?
I take that as a no, then.
I tried! I gave you a chance, and you refused. Do not come crying to me when it all blows up in your face.
Urgh... I see you're not holding back... But it is no matter. You cannot defeat me without the Mana Sword.
Is this...the Mana Sword!? My weary sword has transformed!
What!? How can this be!? But I destroyed it! I'm sure of it!
I was so sure this time...and yet, I have failed.
But tell me, ..主人公..... Why take his side? Do we not share the same ambitions?
What nonsense is that!? ..主人公.. is nothing like you!
Ha...ha ha ha! Not so, if you've anything to do with that Mana Goddess...
I may have lost this time, but I will never give up. I will return...and then you shall see.

Do not lose hope. Even without my powers,
the Mana Sword has answered your heart...
Oh! That reminds me! There's something I still need to tell you about. Got a minute?
Huh!? The ghost up and disappeared! Where did it spook off to?
You're right. I don't see it anywhere... Stupid ghost! Serves us right for blindly following it, though.
But it looks like we're probably on the side of the village where that path would've led.
So, I guess our ghost-pal was guiding us after all!
Which means, Bro just has to be around here somewhere...
Well would you look at that. It's the booger brats.
...But why are they all the way over here?
That is weird... Add that to the list of weird stuff that's happened since we got here.
(Another echo anomaly, perhaps? Like events in a timeline getting all jumbled up?)
(...And that's all the commentary I've got. Until next time!)
Something's got them all riled up, wonder what it is?
B-B-Big trouble! Randi fell down the waterfall!
What!? Randi fell!? Oh no! I knew that moron would get himself into trouble if we left him alone long enough!

We gotta get over there, now!
Popoi! ..主人公..! Let's go!
We make a pretty good team, eh? Feels like nothing could get in our way.
Good work, ..主人公..! I can't believe you slayed an ACTUAL dragon! You're a legend!
And Sumo's right. You two make a good team! Between the two of you, there's nothing to fear.
How bout we do some training later? Could always use for some more practice with the sword, you know?
Off for some monster hunting? Aw man, I wanna go!
Seamoon sure is something, you know? A real role model!
I should probably train with other weapons. Don't wanna become a one trick pony, you know?
Bet you didn't know I can play the harmonica, did ya? Yup. Wanderer taught me how.
Dudbears can go anywhere in the world they want with just a shovel. Can you imagine that? I'm kinda jealous, actually.
Heard you downed a big one all by yourself. Did you really? I kinda find that hard to believe.
You can leave the fighting to me, all right? My skills with the sword are second to none.
Hey, if you ever need to talk, I'm here. If you feel you can confide in me, that is.
I'm gonna keep training till I become the greatest swordsman of all time!
Oooh! My wool's standing on end! I think a new fruit just appeared on the Mana Tree, so let's go check it out!
How's it going? Let me know if you need anything.
Going out for another adventure? Well, if you ever need an extra sword, I'm always ready.
Been on the road so long, feels kind of weird to finally settle down. I think I could get used to this.
You know what a Chocobo is? They're these big yellow birds you can ride? Anyway, don't think I coulda finished my quest without 'em.
You know what this town needs? I mean, don't get me wrong, I love the atmosphere here, but if Lester was here playing his harp? It'd be perfect.
Amanda and me have spent most of our life fighting to survive, you know. It's been tough, but we survived by the help of all our friends.
I can use magic all right, but if I had to pick which I'm better at, I'd say it's the sword. You can thank Bogard for that.
Dwarves sure are a lively bunch, eh? Used to know a Watts. Funny thing though, not the same Watts that's in this town. Seems like a popular name?
I'd love to go out on another adventure, see all kinds of worlds. Without my sword, this time though. Just me and someone I care about, seeing the sights.
Don't think I've ever had, uh, time off? A vacation? No-fight time? Er, anyway, I'm at a loss as to what to do with myself. Must be what peace feels like.
ALL RIGHT FAERIES, GET YOUR GEAR! TIME TO ADD SOME WINGS TO THE COLLECTION!
Well, well, well, looks like we got some spies in our midst! I love bashing in spy skulls!
Nonono. No spy. We no spy. Not spies. We're envoys! Here to negotiate a truce!
We're on a mission of peace! Bashing in our skulls would be...savage! Yes, totally uncouth!
You got a lot of nerve, you floating furball.
Ahhh! Sorry! I didn't mean to offend! Please don't hurt me!
Yo CHIEF! These two here are actin' like they're tougher than we are. You should show 'em who's boss!
Wonderful! Now, let's handle this whole war business real quick and then get on with the questions!
I don't think we'll be getting out of this without a fight.
Buuut! If you win, they'll probably be your friends.
I'll be rooting for you from over here. Good luuuck!
I don't think we'll be getting out of this without a fight.
Buuut! If you win, they'll probably be your friends.
I'll be rooting for you from over here. Good luuuck!
It's just you and me now.
It's time I put an end to you, and your false mission.
Heheh! I've really got the hang of this now! Come on, everybody! We're moving on!
Okay, okay. But don't get too crazy now and bring the cavern down on our heads.
That's funny. Thought I heard the sound of someone being ungrateful... Must've been my imagination. Let's go!
Hey, Julius! Get your head out of the clouds or you'll get hurt.
Ah, right. I'm on my way.
(This power is unimaginable... She's no ordinary girl, but formidable indeed...)
(Perhaps I can use her. Draw her away from her friends and make her power my own? No, I doubt she would submit to my ideals...)
(Maybe I could brainwash her with magic... But in the instance she resists my magic, it'll be more trouble than it's worth.)
(But if do nothing about her, she may become an obstacle in the Empire's restoration.)
(In that case, I must act now...)
(I'll have to set that aside. Right now, the Mana Stones come first.)
This is a dead end. What could be going on to cause this disturbance?
And it's only getting worse. We've got to be veeery careful from here.
I-Is that what I think it is!? I absolutely HATE lizards!
What are you standing there for!? Attack!
No way! Anything but lizards! I can't even look at them!
Tch. Still a child after all? Then move!
Ooh. I think it's working. Guess lizard dude can't take the heat.
Too bad I'm the only one trying to fight it! I can't do this alone!
Look, Angela. Is this really where you wanna draw the line? Being scared of a little lizard is kinda lame, if you ask me.
I thought you were a princess from the kingdom of magicians. Was it all a lie? Do you even want to help your homeland like you said?
...Fine! I get it! We're clearly desperate here.

So lend me your strength!
Here it comes... Blaze Wall!
Good... But my magic won't be outdone!
Yeah, that's the spirit. And don't be shy now, ..主人公... You don't wanna miss out on the fun, do you?
So, where do you think Pearl could be? Any ideas?
Huh? Are you serious? Absolutely none?
Quit your yammering! With or without clues, I'll find her!
Okay, okay! We get it... Wow, she must be pretty important to you.
Indeed. You could say I've been waiting for her my whole life.
Is that right? Well then, we'd better get this search party started! Let's split up and talk to folks around town.
It sounded like a great plan at the time, but no dice. How about you, ..主人公..? Find anything good?
Maybe Elazul had better luck. Let's check in on him, shall we?
You! Speak up! What are you hiding!?
Don't anger me any further. If you intend to hide something from me...
...Then you leave me no choice but to choke it out of you.
Why are you stopping me? Don't interrupt my questioning.
Is that what you call it? Sounded more like a threat to me.
Can't you see? I'm questioning people like we discussed. Just a little further, and...
Was it just me, or did you say something about choking?
Look. I get that you're feeling impatient, but is this really the best approach? At the rate you're going, they'll either be too scared to talk, or unable to!
I suppose you're right...but I don't know any other methods.
Allow me to show you how it's done. I am a professional, you know. The key to getting into someone's good graces is to act like a gentleman.
It's not enough to be a Knight?
It's all in the approach. You've got to be cool and collected. Then, when they're least expecting it, hit 'em with a question.
Sounds difficult. What do you think, ..主人公..?
You know what? Just pretend you're talking to Pearl.
Act like they're Pearl, huh? All right, I think I can do that.
Don't forget to relax! And only bring out the big guns when the timing's right!
Here goes. Let's try this again, shall we?
Hey! Uh...I mean, pardon me. I'm looking for a friend. Have you seen a stranger around these parts?
Bit of a rough start, but you got the hang of it in the end! All you need is some practice.
Alright, Elazul, here's someone coming our way! Just do like you practiced and you should be fine.
Excuse me, but I'm looking for a friend. Have you see a girl pass through here?
She has a white pearl. You can't miss her. Ring any bells?
A pearl, you say? ...Oh! I'm pretty sure I saw a girl like that headed towards the Mekiv Caverns.
But those caverns are pretty dangerous, you know. And—
That has to be her! Let's go!
Boy, they're in quite the hurry! Hmm… I hope they'll be all right.
Wait a sec. That girl did have a pearl, but it wasn't white...or was it?
(Keep it cool, Elazul... Then strike while the iron is hot!)
In another world, you bested me. You took the Mana Sword, and with that, thwarted all my plans.
But the memory of this world gives me the chance at a do-over. And with my victory, I will right history!
I won't let you win! And once again, I'll stop you in your tracks!
..主人公..! Your friends filled me in on everything. I'm on your side, but for now, I need you to be on mine!
I...not a good talker. But talking with you...I like.
Oh, good to see you again! Now, this time? We spar, yes? You spar?
I know difference between good smell and evil smell. Evil man, evil smell. Good man, good smell...most of time.
Mmmm I smell very delicious smell coming from...that way! Do you want come with?
I very bad at puzzle, so not very big fan of dungeon. I more like forest and outside. Fewer puzzle.
Ludgar...he does not like human very much. But, many beastman DO like human. Like me, I am a beastman that like human.
During night time, Beastman go through change. We get very strong, but some beastman get also very mean. I say, be careful around beastman at night.
I HATE sitting around! I want to go on adventure! ...I always ready for adventure...
Karl is my best friend! Very special to me. You, also very special friend! If you need help, ask me! I help! Always!
Mmm... You smell just like Karl smell. It the good person smell! We now friends forever!
I'm a busy guy you know. If you don't need me for anything, I'm goin' home.
Duffle is at it again, eh? Where does she find all that energy?
Hey, I'm a lot more useful out there than your average adult. So don't treat me like some kid.
I'll have you know, these clothes are standard sorcerer attire!
Of course you have to try hard at it. Goals don't just meet themselves, you know.
Watts is a trusted member of this town, got it? Don't go causing him any trouble.
I'm surrounded by idiots. Can't imagine what would happen if I wasn't here... Guess I better stick around, you know, just in case.
You should read the legend of the Mana Tree... Because it'd be helpful, and, uhhh, we could talk about it, too?
If you need me to do something, just say it. I am one of your knights, after all.
You in some kind of trouble again? ...Well just let me know if you need my help.
Hmph. If you're lookin' for encouragement from me, you're barkin' up the wrong tree.
Oh? Um, well... If you don't mind me saying it...
Keep going, ..主人公... I'm rooting for you too!
In the darkness and all alone... That's a pathetic way to go.
Things are only getting tougher. And the monsters are swarming in... Can you keep it up?
You're almost to the end, and then everything will be alright. Just have faith and keep pushing through!
What a nice place this is...
Do you have anything you might need help with? All this waiting around makes me anxious.
Right now I'm in the middle of handling a request. Nothing major, but I welcome the work!
My clothes? Someone gave them to me quite a long time ago.
Shopping, eh? Can't say I'm want for anything especially.
Say, have you seen anyone around who could be wolfkin?
I'm no good at hiding things. You just see it in my face.
You want to...pet me? How do I respond...
I beg of you, be more careful. Don't rush into danger alone.
Feel free to come to me with anything you need. I'm much older and wiser, you see.
Wow, hey! We won! Wouldja look at that.

The time is ripe.
Open your eyes...
Whew! That thing was tougher than it looked!
And somehow we've wound up back at a gusthall. Are we dreaming or something?
I don't think so. This dream has one too many people in it. Not very romantic, don't you think?
Hey, I'm only joking! You're not in the way, and we definitely need you here!
Yes! You are very much needed! So stick closer to me please!
Oh! Pretty bold, huh? Ha ha! We'd better stop before her highness here dies of embarrassment!
All jokes aside, these may be just obstacles to slow down those with their sights set on the Sword of Mana. We'd better hurry it up.
You're saying I'm in the way?
To think, we're both searching for the same sword. Funny, huh?
Apparently it's my destiny to free the Sword of Mana. Faerie has told me that enough times to turn blue in the face!
How 'bout you? Got any winged friends that won't shut up about the Mana Sword?
...Is it that guy over there? The big fluff ball. Doesn't look much like a faerie, though.
That would be because I am not a faerie! I'm a sheep! Is it not obvious?
You definitely don't look like any sheep I've seen. And I've seen a few sheep.
Did you want something? I don't mind, as long as you stay out of my way.
No one will stop me from fulfilling my destiny.
Scared of death? Ha. I have no fear of dying.
I'm meeting all sorts of folks around here. Is your fluffy friend an elemental spirit? If it's a demon... Let's just say I don't take too kindly to them.
My master once told me that you decide your destiny. There is no victory for those who bend their will.
Will you stand for justice with me? Or be like Daena, an enemy to humans and protecting demons?
Is there someone you want to protect? For me, I must defend Matilda. And for that reason, I will defeat Irwin!
I'll admit you're starting to grow on me. Maybe I'll keep you company on this journey a little longer.
Something's off about you. I get the feeling you'll trip me up if I'm not careful. But for now, I'll take you at your word.
You have a heart of justice. I can tell!
This is an event quest. A fruit that's ripe for a limited time only, you could say!
You can get all sorts of exclusive rewards from event quests, so be sure to play! You won't want to miss out!
(I can hear their voices... They echo still...)
Come on now, lackey! Make your boss, proud! It's too soon for you to tap out, yeah?
You know it is! And you promised to come back and show us your Mana Sword when you got it, remember? Break your promise and you just might get a Potos Village pounding!
You better hang in there! I'll always have your back, so don't let your boss down now!
I've had enough of this storm! It's too cold out here, and I can't even see my hand in front of my face!
Huh? Then what was all that stuff about good fit and warm magic?
It's not limitless, okay!? Ugh, could the Mana disturbance have something to do with this crazy weather?
I can see a cavern up ahead, so just hold on a little longer.
Hm? We should be in the right place...
What are we doing here, Julius? Oh! The entrance is blocked.
So, what do we do now? At this rate, we'll be popsicles before the disturbance sics more monsters on us.
Hmph. This won't be too hard for me to break through with my magic.
Hey, it's not like you're all healed up either. Don't push yourself too hard.

Instead, let me give it a try!
Haaa! Fireball!
...Wow. That was so fast I missed it.
Why isn't it working!? I was totally in control of my power before! Come on! Do your thing!
Calm down. It's likely that the Mana disturbance has gotten stronger. One can hardly control their magic in this state.
And you've only just learned to wield your powers, right? A novice like yourself can't be expected to overcome such an obstacle.
Hmph! Well excuuuse me for being a novice!
Just listen to me. If the disturbance is getting stronger, it means that we're getting closer to the source.
Moreover, your problem is only a matter of experience. There's always a way around it.
Well, what do you suggest we do then?
I'll work on bringing order to the disturbance. While I do that, try casting your magic again. Can you do that?
I can give it shot! But are you sure you can hold it together? You're still injured and all.
You underestimate me. I suggest you focus on your own strength.
Don't you worry about me. I'm the royal princess of Altena, Kingdom of Magicians!
Nice. The entrance is wide open now...for a new set of problems. Yay.
Seems we've rattled some monsters out of their nest. You can handle this, right, Princess?
Oh yeah! Let me show you how!
(Tch... Its awakening must've caused the entrance to collapse...)
..主人公..! Good job back there! I'm so glad to see you safe!
You've certainly learned how to fight better, that's for sure. I was worried what would happen when Duffle and I got separated from you.
Hehe, sorry for slipping out on you! We got warped to some place and couldn't find our way back. Must've given you a heart attack!
But we met up with Sumo and got reunited with each other. So all's well that ends well, right?
...I'm too exhausted to argue, so I'll just let you have that.
Hey, ..主人公..! Good thing we weren't split up for too long. Is Sumo's sword the Mana Sword you're looking for?

Oo! Oo! I can do it! Let me!
How about no. Everybody knows I'm better at explaining things!
Oo! Do I smell a fight brewing? Go ahead! Rip each other to shreds!
...Maybe it'd be best if you explained instead.
There's so much to process here... This sword you're after, you say it's supposed to be here?
Hate to burst your bubble, but legends aren't always true...
I know, I know. You're going to say it's all made up. That's what I've been trying to tell these guys!
But we're just making 100% sure that the sword ISN'T here.
I see. Sorry for assuming. I guess kids your age would have realized by now...
You're out searching for lost treasure! What's more fun than that?
In fact, it sounds so fun even I wanna take part! Let me join the party!
That's a no from me. The Mana Sword isn't some cheap trinket.
Yeah, yeah, whatever. You don't have many friends do you?
Hah! Then that makes two of us! We're gonna get along just fine, Honeybee.
Count me in. I'm still a little worried about you guys, after all.
Hey, Raxa, what brings you to these ruins anyway?
You said this was your turf, but do you actually live here?
Yup. Thanks to the monsters, I get the place aaall to myself. I've got a roof over my head and plenty of space to relax.
Then you must know if the Mana Sword is here or not, right?
Fraid not. Just moved in a couple days ago.
We know how Blainchet did it, but how did you cross the lake?
Maybe we should swim on the way back?
Right!? Last one to the shore is a rotten egg!
I'd rather be a rotten egg than a sunken sorcerer!
Why swim when we have a boat? Besides, I thought the Goddess could just 'whisk us all back home?'
You're right! I almost forgot! Hee hee!
I could go for a swim.
Uh oh! There's too much grass blocking our path! We won't be able to just push our way through.
You're just going to have to cut it away with your weapon attack. Hmph... They should be thanking us for the free service!
Hm? Is there something on my face?
Hey, you wanna come play with me and Faye?
Buju's run off again! I should probably go catch him, eh?
What's the deal with the vines? Gonna be honest. I have no idea.
No Tree Folk here, but this place has all sorts of folks!
This feather is from a guardian beast. Name was Flammie, I think?
Call on me for anything, okay? I'll be there to help!
A blacksmith named Watts? The king of Ishe shares the name.
The people here are so warm and friendly...almost as much as the people in Illusia!
Why is it so hot in here?
I bet it's, like, a guardian spirit or something! I wonder if it's protecting the sword.
All I know is, that thing wasn't in any legend!
Is it using the equipment of adventurers it's defeated? It'll be tough getting past its defenses.
Then we should just attack it from behind!
Hooo wee! This tower just keeps going and going! I can't even see through the clouds to the top!
What do they need all those floors for anyway? Do you think this place is famous or somethin'? Come on, Baashear. Fill us in with the deets!
I won't feign knowledge about things the Mana Goddess doesn't deem important enough to teach me.
Say...could this be THAT tower? The one named after the mage Twillwool the Great?
A mage named Twillwool... Never heard of 'em. But not surprised you have, Honeycomb.
I only read about him in a book. He was renowned amongst magic users, it seems.
And apparently, he was as eccentric as he was famous. They say he was sort of fickle in his ways.
Like, he swore to keep every last one of the precious treasures he'd collected over his lifetime even after his death.
So the story goes that he built a magic tower as tall as the heavens and hid them all inside.
Are you kidding me!? If that story's true, then there's all sorts of cool loot in this place!
Uh, were you even listening? This is a REAL magic tower built by a REAL mage, who—need I remind you—didn't WANT to share his loot.
I've heard the inside resembles nothing tower-ish, so there's no way of knowing what's waiting beyond those walls. This place is very much a trap.

But don't you get it, Honeycomb? THAT'S what makes it fun.
Back me up here, ..主人公..!
No, it is very much a trap. This is a REAL magic tower built by a REAL mage who didn't WANT to share his loot.
I doubt any good will come out of snooping around in there. I've heard the inside is disorienting and resembles nothing tower-ish.
Well, say no more, Honeycomb! I wasn't 100% sure at first, but now I'm POSTIVE we've got to get in there and see it for ourselves!

I'll even let you in on a little secret. The trick with traps is...just don't get caught!
Now let the magic tower expedition begin!
...I knew it. I knew as soon as I mentioned treasure there'd be no stopping her. Come on, ..主人公... We'd better get going too!

Foolish thieves eager to get their greedy palms on my treasures...
You shall see they belong to me.
...And no one else.
Hmph. Find someone else to 'chat' with.
Best to keep your distance, else you want to become my next sacrifice.
Who could research ancient magic in a place as wretchedly happy as this?
I strike fear into the hearts of all those who stand before me, and yet here you are... Interesting...
This life energy! It's... Hmmm... Never mind.
Wouldn't you love my powers? Even monsters bend to my will!
The sword's chosen hero, huh? Ha! And what makes one chosen?
Want to see my true face, do you? Hmph. You couldn't handle it.
Take a peek under this mask and be prepared to feel my wrath.
You shall be my next... Wait. I have a better use for you.
I s-s-saw her too! Just now! The Mana Goddess appeared right before my eyes!
Could this be a good omen for an echo!? A sign to guide us to the Mana Tree here!?
Baa hum hum! I'm so excited that my tail is shaking!
We're on the right track! We'll just stick with Sumo!
Did you take a hit from a dark attack? If you're blinded, I have some eye drops on me I can lend you. Just say the word.
You sure? Okay, if you say so.
You know, the feel of this place reminds me so much of home. Just can't help but feel at ease here.
I've had my fair share of adventures too, journeying all over. So I know a thing or two about wielding a weapon.
Meeting all sorts of folks on your journey will be the key to your strength. I just know it!
Say, have you seen Shiloh around?
Do you come home to this place? It's a wonderful thing, don't you think? Having a place to come home to.
I've seen a few familiar faces around already! I think I'm gonna like it here.
Where I come from, we've got penguins for pirates! Would you believe it!?
I'm no stranger to hard work. I've raised some pets that were literal monsters, tended an orchard, and even did a bit of weapon tempering. All on my own, too!
There are times when we need the strength to shield the ones most dear to us.
Duba Duda Dubba... Just practicing my dudbear. Ever heard of it?
Incredible! Now we've got one more ally on our side we can rely on!
Aren't you excited? Things are really going to go our way now!
There are all sorts of ally echoes in your reach, ..主人公... And don't forget your closest one—me!
That's all I've got for now. So let's get back to searching for the Mana Sword, shall we?
Wonderful! Now you're stronger and on your way to becoming a fine fighter! I'm so proud of ewe!
Gear is an important key to finding the Mana Sword! If you're ever feeling stuck, come back and gear up!

Alright! Here we go, ..主人公..!
Just leave this to me!
If we're talking melee combat, between the two of us, Duffle's the one to go with, for sure.
Check which allies are best for the battlefield based on their weapon and element, and switch out allies as you battle!
You must be here to see the Mana Tree too, right? If so, we're headed in the same direction.
Truth is, there's an evil-doer with his sights set on the Mana Tree. And I'm determined to stop him.
Don't worry, you're not the evil-doer of which I speak. You're the hand of the Mana Goddess after all, right?
Sorry, I'm still a little stuck on when you said 'ages ago.' Just how old are you, anyway?
Well, I don't know how old you are, but let's just say, I doubt it.
Okay. Like, yeah, I'm pretty sure I'm older than you. But what do you mean by 'super' old!?
So, uhhh... How old are you, again?
I am... I-don't-know years old. Sorry, I kinda forgot.
Huh!? Is that even a thing!?
Then let me ask... How old are you, ..主人公..?
Don't bother asking. ..主人公.. doesn't remember anything, let alone a birthday.
I'm a newborn! And as fluffy and fresh as one to boot!
Ohhh? But that's the case with most creatures, I suppose...
Rippin' and rarin' to go. Just let me know when you're ready for adventure!
This town's not that bad, honestly. I'd say it's about on par with Pandora.
You gotta train, or instead of swinging your sword, it's gonna start swinging you.
And if you practice your martial arts, you bet no one's gonna... Stop looking at me like that! I have hobbies! I do other things!
You can't ignore that self care. For mind AND body.
You'd never think it by looking at her, but Luka down at the water palace is hundreds of years old!
Going out on adventures with you... Seeing all those new sights... I could get used to that.
Hey. You're a long stronger than you think. Show some confidence!
Not a lot of folks out there I can count on to have my back out there. Says a lot about how much I trust you! Heh.
Hey! You've got a memory gem on you, right? Equip it to your party for a boost to their power!
Wait, look at that! The wind is blocking the way forward!
But this is looking pretty familiar, wouldn't you say? Baahaha! Old Baashear has this all figured out!
Try hitting the switch with your weapon. I'm sure the path will open right up!
Let's start with the basics. First, how about you try moving left and right?
You've got it. I guess that was a little easy though.
Only one thing left to do now—and that's attack!
Nice work! Not bad for a first-timer.
Time to try something a little more advanced. Use skills to make quick work of your opponents!
All right! Now you're getting the hang of it!
We've gotta even up the odds here. I think it's about time we use a special technique. Go ahead, give 'em a thrashing!
Seems like you've got a handle on things. All right, let's take the rest of these guys out!
Looks like we're here? This is a different village...right?
Yeah, this is Centralis. It's called that cause it's between the other two villages. *yawn* Well, anyway, good luck you two. Have fun.
Why do I get the feeling we're the only two taking this seriously? Mousseline didn't even bother to stay and introduce us. And we're outsiders.
These faeries are in the middle of a war, you know! The situation is tense on all sides, I bet. Who knows how they'll receive us?
First and foremost, we need to think smart and think carefully! Let's hang back a bit and watch before we weave a way in.
HUMAN! SPIKEY HAIR! ...Can I touch it?
AAAAH! A HUMAN! ...And would you look at that HAIR! What kind of product do you use!?
We just don't get a lot of visitors here, so you can imagine how exciting a human randomly showing up would be! Anyway, what brings you to Centralis?
YESSS! THIS IS SOOO...okay I'm over it.
Hm? What was that? Was that a word? Uh! Uh! Uhh?
Oookayyy... Listen, we're here to negotiate a truce.
A truce!? Okay, you convinced me.
We didn't want to do a stupid war anyway.
Yeah! It's the Briarborough faeries that are all 'I wanna do a war! Grr! Grr! Uh! Uh!' All we were doing was getting them before they could get us!
So if you can convince them, we'd love to make a truce!
Well, that went from panic to peace really quick! I'm even kind of disappointed with how easy that was.
But at least you all are easy to talk to! Do you mind answering a few questions?
Ah, yes, wonderful. You see, we're searching for the Mana Sword. Do you know how to find it? Are there some criteria we must meet or something?
The Mana Sword? Well, yeah, you have to be part of the Mana clan to get the Mana Sword.
Nooo!? Only humans chosen by a faerie can have the Mana Sword.
Really? I don't remember choosing Big Bro? He kinda just found it.
Isn't the Mana Sword an Excalibur kind of situation?
What's an 'Excalibur'? The Mana Sword is the Mana Sword.
Ummm... Wait a second. One of those faeries looked familiar.
Eyyy, there's my lackey. Why so surprised? I'm more or less a faerie. Makes total sense I'd be here.
I had no idea you were a faerie... Anyway, we have more pressing matters to attend to!
Yeah. I'm a faerie, so it makes total sense I'd be here.
Okay, sure. But I'm afraid we're not here to talk about whether that makes sense or not!
So, why are you lookin' for the Mana Sword? Hm? Hmmm?
So that the Mana Tree may be fully restored! The Mana Goddess has tasked us with this most noble mission!
Ohhh okay! Do you even know how to use it, though?
Use it? Well...now that you mention it... It doesn't just work?
Oh! Well, to restore the Mana Tree, alls ya gotta do is take the chosen girl, lift up the Mana Sword all cool like, and then stab her with the pointy end!
Do what now? Stab? Who? The Mana Goddess!?
Haha! Yikes! Oh wow, I do not envy you at all.
Okay. Okay. Okayokay... But if I understand correctly, we need the power of a faerie to find it. Do I have it correct?
You said it! It feels like there's a knot in my wool I can't get out!
Well, okay. We did what we came here to do. Let's move on to the next village, shall we?
That faerie from the other echo?
